verses.name: Philemon 1:16
verses.text: Not now as a servant, but above a servant, a brother beloved, specially to me, but how much more unto thee, both in the flesh, and in the Lord?

verses.name: Philemon 1:17
verses.text: If thou count me therefore a partner, receive him as myself.

verses.name: Philemon 1:18
verses.text: If he hath wronged thee, or oweth thee ought, put that on mine account;

verses.name: Philemon 1:19
verses.text: I Paul have written it with mine own hand, I will repay it: albeit I do not say to thee how thou owest unto me even thine own self besides.
